Text: This game seems to become great, cant wait for the complet game to come :)

I agree.. GTR 1 was really awesome, but the car behaviour in GTR 2 is even better! Also, if you didn't try it already; try to start a race at 2 am with 60x time acceleration. First enjoy how the headlights actually work like REAL headlights (try running the dark sections on the course with headlights off). Then enjoy the sunrise... ;)
Why dont you give us the real thing? It's released already!
well this sucks, 0 seeds and le's, guess ill go to the website and see if i can get a demo their
